site_title: Flapping Bird by Samuel L. Randlett

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold the Randlett's Flapping Bird designed by Samuel L. Randlett. This simple origami bird is easy to fold and fun to play with. A must learn for everyone. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
